scripts.prepare-build: npm run test && rimraf build && tsc && tsc -p . --outDir build/dist/esnext --module es2015 --target esnext  && copy README.md build
scripts.publish-dev: npm run prepare-build && npm version prepatch && ts-node export-package && npm publish build --tag dev
scripts.publish-patch: npm run prepare-build && npm version patch    && ts-node export-package && npm publish build
scripts.publish-minor: npm run prepare-build && npm version minor    && ts-node export-package && npm publish build
scripts.publish-major: npm run prepare-build && npm version major    s&& ts-node export-package && npm publish build
